Customers use only the vendor’s components, so sourcing best-of-breed technology for specific parts of the workflow is not an option. These solutions are often designed around a narrow set of use cases that work well for certain requirements and less so for others, and the ability to control or tune the platform to a provider’s unique needs is limited.
